titles.title: Jury ACCESS Act of 2023
Jury ACCESS Act of 2023
Jury Access for Capable Citizens and Equality in Service Selection Act of 2023
A bill to amend title 28, United States Code, to prohibit the exclusion of individuals from service on a Federal jury on account of sexual orientation or gender identity.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.

bill.summary:
Jury Access for Capable Citizens and Equality in Service Selection Act of 2023 or the Jury ACCESS Act of 2023
This bill prohibits the exclusion of individuals from jury service on the basis of their sexual orientation or gender identity.
